snippet: The currency fell against the euro and the yen after data showed nonfarm payrolls rose by 120,000 in March, well below expectations.
abstract: Activity is light as United States stock markets are closed and bond market closes early in observance of Good Friday; much of Asia is off as well.
lead_paragraph: The currency fell against the euro and the yen after data showed nonfarm payrolls rose by 120,000 in March, well below expectations.

headline.seo: Dollar’s Standing Slips After Mixed Jobs Data
headline.main: Dollar’s Standing Slips After Mixed Jobs Numbers
headline.print_headline: Dollar’s Standing Slips After Mixed Jobs Numbers
